::Spears::

 She looked at Ramulas with a solom expression on her face.

"You know, I truely do appologize for acting foolish and risking your 
friend's life like that. I'll watch it from now on."

She turned and loked back at the ship.
She knew she had a temper to match the sharpness of her quills.
But restraining her temper was one of the few lessons in life she had 
yet to master.  She really was sorry that she had risked another 
bot's life like that.  She didn't give a darn about her own life, but 
the life of another Maximal was too precious a thing to be risking 
like that.
